author: lektran
msg: Make references to Delegator and LocalDispatcher transient and provide methods to retrieve the objects when missing in ProductCofigWrapper and ProductConfigItemContentWrapper.  Prevents non-serializable exceptions from being thrown when attempting to serialize a ShoppingCart object.  Thanks to Arun Patidar for the patch.
